list.pageDescription: Create your own live browsers to interact with websites, or run workflows in.

headers.occupiedHelp: Browser is busy running a task or workflow

drawer.title: Create Browser Session
drawer.description: Create a new browser session to interact with websites, or run workflows in.
drawer.proxyLocationHelp: Route Skyvern through one of our available proxies.
drawer.timeoutHelp: Duration to keep the browser session open. Automatically extends as it is used.

tabs.streamHelp: The live stream of the browser session (if active).
tabs.recordingsHelp: All recordings of this browser session.

stopDialog.title: Are you sure?
stopDialog.description: Are you sure you want to stop (shut down) this browser session?
